title: Cardi B Interview and More
itunes:title: Cardi B Interview and More
description:
Tuesday 4/10- Today on the show we had Binderella or better known as Cardi b, grace us with her presence as she discussed her game plan on handling being pregnant and still having a music career, her new album "Invasion of Privacy", and more. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to Green Bay Packers Trevor Davis after he made a bomb joke, and out of all places an airport, go figure. Also, we had a listener shoot their shot at a crush, and turned out that all he needed was a boost in confidence.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

Tuesday 4/10- Today on the show we had Binderella or better known as Cardi b, grace us with her presence as she discussed her game plan on handling being pregnant and still having a music career, her new album "Invasion of Privacy", and more. Also, we had a listener shoot their shot at a crush, and turned out that all he needed was a boost in confidence.
